per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=wave_a=0;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=//// flexi's beat counter
per_frame_5=bt1 = bt1*0.95 + sqr(bass*5)*30/fps;
per_frame_6=mt1 = mt1*0.95 + sqr(mid*5)*30/fps;
per_frame_7=tt1 = tt1*0.95 + sqr(treb*5)*30/fps;
per_frame_8=bt2 = bt2 + bt1*0.005;
per_frame_9=mt2 = mt2 + mt1*0.005;
per_frame_10=tt2 = tt2 + tt1*0.005;
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=q1 = bt2 *0.01;
per_frame_13=q2 = mt2 *0.01;
per_frame_14=q3 = tt2 *0.01;
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=q4=2+.7*sin(.3*q1);
per_frame_17=q5=.5+.5*sin(.5*q2);
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=q11=abs(sin(.3*q1));
per_frame_20=q12=abs(sin(.3*q2));
per_frame_21=q13=abs(sin(.3*q3));
per_pixel_1=/// based on bdrv code
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=rot=.1*pow(-ang,3)-q4*sin((.5+.5*sin(.2*q1))*ang);
per_pixel_4=zoom=(.8+.2*sin(.2*q2))*sin((.2*sin(.2*q3))-rad)+1.3;
per_pixel_5=zoom=zoom+.02*sin(10*sin(q5+x));
